alert.note: Alert for Dent; Douglas; Howell; Shannon; Texas; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 06 at 1:21PM CST until March 08 at 8:19PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in south central Missouri, Dent, Howell, Oregon, Shannon and Texas. In southwest Missouri, Douglas, Ozark, Taney and Wright. * WHEN...From 6 PM CST this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - 1 to 2 inches of rain, with locally higher amounts, is forecast to fall in a relatively short amount of time as thunderstorms move through the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Dent; Douglas; Howell; Shannon; Texas; Wright
